context.p: After DNS is setup correctly, creation and deletion of buckets will automatically create DNS entries. The DNS service embedded in the CLC will respond with the Walrus IP when a DNS request is made for <bucketname>.walrus.<subdomain>.
Instance IP addresses will be mapped as euca-A.B.C.D.eucalyptus.<subdomain>, where A.B.C.D is the IP address (or addresses) assigned to your instance.
